data.name: Armada de Barlovento est
data.desc: Sp Crown establishes permanent squadron, to be based in Veracruz, to defend against piracy, foreign settlements on mainland, and to escort Veracruz-Havana treasure fleets
data.prim_n: INDIFERENTE,451,L.A8 porción 1 ff 141v-144r (128v-131r) [a 26 jun 1624] / DIVERSOS-COLECCIONES,32,N.5 / MEXICO,35,N.2 / MEXICO,360,R.5,N.31
data.note:
Or rather 1598 /v Zahedieh F 166 no 86 /v Hussey 292, 293, 296, 297 /
 These problems [eg being absent from the Caribbean during half the year] were very apparent during the first phase of deployment [of the Armada] in the 1640s and where to plague Barlovento during the remainder of its precarious existence /v Lang 582 /
 Dating = 1667 [under command of Agustín de Diústegui] by Marley P 1 26 / See Bibiano Torres Ramírez, *La Armada de Barlovento* [Seville, Escuela de Estudios Hispano-americanos, 1981] /v Marley P 1 34 /
 1 Nov 1591 Spain. Real cédula instructs Pres of Guat to raise taxes to est Armada of Barlovento /v Rubio G 131-132
